text: Richard Lee Bond (September 18, 1935 â€“ July 23, 2020) was an American banker, lawyer and Republican politician. He was born in Kansas City, Kansas. He was a member of the Kansas State Senate from 1987 to 2000. He was president of the senate between 1996 and 2000.Public Official of the Year, 2000 Dick Bond, Governing Magazine, Alan Greenblatt, 2000. Retrieved October 7, 2018.Kansas State Library-Kansas Legislators Past and President-Richard Bond Bond died on July 23, 2020 in Overland Park, Kansas at the age of 84.Former Kansas State Senate President Dick Bond Has Died ==References== Category:Kansas Republicans Category:Members of the Kansas Legislature Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from Kansas Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:Politicians from Kansas Category:People from Kansas City, Kansas Category:People from Overland Park, Kansas
title: Dick Bond (Kansas politician)
